title: Happy Thanksgiving
content:
For Thanksgiving Day as always the latest in health, nutrition and healing, and ways to live a healthier, longer life. <!--more--> Plus, an interview with Ronnie Cummins, author of “Genetically Engineered Foods: A Self Defense Guide for Consumers,” on recent wins and losses in the fight against Big Ag, and where we go from here.
Then, special testimonials from a group of people who have improved their health and quality of life with the help of Gary and his associates.
Happy Thanksgiving everyone!
